OUR WORKS

KJK AFRICA provides engaging and exciting software solutions for modern retail. Our team will be happy to lend web services to promote your business, creating scalable solutions to attract new buyers and boost engagement from old ones. We help your business to reach a larger audience and build long lasting relationships and create an appealing shopping experience.

WEBSITES AND APPS BRANDING LOGO

tru-DATA

Verification Application

tru- DATA is a user friendly mobile and web application that is developed to authenticate documents, progressively eliminate counterfeiting and ease document verification processes. tru- DATA is also an e-platform for retrieving, reclaiming and repossessing documents easily. This technology is currently owned and proprietary to only Tripple Gee & CO. PLC in West Africa.

READ MORE

AFIAANYI

Ecommerce

AFIAANYI is the first e-business directory from east Nigeria that offers a market place for buying and selling products and services. AFIAANYI is designed to connect Local Businesses and Brands to the world by providing E- tools for sellers and suppliers to gain global audience, delivering peace of mind to business owners looking for marketing and visibility support. Reliable, Affordable, Professional.

READ MORE

TWO REPORT

News & Research

Miss to Mrs is a guide for a stress free wedding from a bride’s point of view. It also includes details of how to enjoy the first years of your details of how to enjoy the first years of marriage. It contains live experiences from wedding planning and the first year of marriage

CAKES GALLERY

Ecommerce

Cakes Gallery is a custom cake bakery serving Lagos and its environment, they are a household name when it comes to confectionaries, and their customers travel from as far as Ibadan to purchase their cake.
